page.title: 07KINGSCLERE CHILDREN'S LIFE
page.content: In Kingsclere there are lots of children's activities. They start with playgroups for the younger children. There are three{playgroups}in the village, which meet in the youth club and the Community Centre. For older children there are{Cub {Scouts and Brownies, Guides and {Scouts.}There are{Sunday Schools}in the three churches. There is a{Youth {Club}which has its own building in Coppice Road, where children can play games and hold dances. There are{dancing classes and drama {classes}too. The{County library}has just opened a children's room. After school there are clubs. We have art club, football club, gym club and chess club. There are three{playgrounds}in the village with swings, slides and climbing frames.
